alert.note: Alert for Baker; Bradford; Eastern Clay; South Central Duval; Union; Western Clay; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 4:46PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Bradford, southeastern Baker, east central Union, northwestern Clay and southwestern Duval Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 446 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northeast of Raiford, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Orange Park, Starke, Raiford, Middleburg, Mandarin, Maxville, Fleming Island, Ortega, Oakleaf Plantation and Bellair-Meadowbrook Terrace. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Baker; Bradford; Eastern Clay; South Central Duval; Union; Western Clay; Western Duval
